title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Bailte Seirbhíse
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Bailte Seirbhíse 

Gaeltachta a Ainmniú), 2021 a ghairm den Ordú seo.

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Ainmnítear baile a shonraítear sa Sceideal mar Bhaile Seirbhíse
text_raw:
2. Ainmnítear baile a shonraítear sa Sceideal mar Bhaile Seirbhíse 

Gaeltachta críocha alt 9(1) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9 Samhain, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [580] 3 

SCEIDEAL 

Baile Seirbhíse Gaeltachta: Daingean Uí Chúis, Co. Chiarraí 

(1) An baile seo a leanas: Daingean Uí Chúis 

Baile Seirbhíse Gaeltachta: Leitir Ceanainn, Co. Dhún na nGall 

(1) An baile seo a leanas: Leitir Ceanainn 

Baile Seirbhíse Gaeltachta: Cathair na Gaillimhe, Co. na Gaillimhe 

(1) An baile seo a leanas: Cathair na Gaillimhe 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh, 
 13 Deireadh Fómhair 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Tuarasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [580] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 580 of 2021 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT SERVICE 
TOWNS) ORDER 2021 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [580] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 580 of 2021 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT SERVICE 
TOWNS) ORDER 2021 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Service Towns) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht service towns) order 2021

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. A town specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht Service
text_raw:
2. A town specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht Service 
Town for the purposes of section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 
2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [580]
text_norm: 2 town specified schedule designated gaeltacht service town purpose section 9(1) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th november 2021 6 580

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: Gaeltacht Service Town: Daingean Uí Chúis, Co. Kerry
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Gaeltacht Service Town: Daingean Uí Chúis, Co. Kerry 

(1) The following town: Daingean Uí Chúis 

Gaeltacht Service Town: Letterkenny, Co. Donegal 

(1) The following town: Letterkenny 

Gaeltacht Service Town: Galway City, Co. Galway 

(1) The following town: Galway City 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 13 October 2021 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 

Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [580] 7
